title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.7 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.7 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) The fees for
copies of available records shall be as follows: (1)

Twenty-five cents per page. (2)

Existing computer printouts: 25 cents per
page. (3)

Initial printout from
computer file: computer time-charges shall be based on current rates and
computer resources used and shall not exceed actual cost. If the requestor does
not provide the necessary computer tape and labels, the fee for such computer
tape and labels shall be the actual cost thereof to the department. (4)

Any other record: the actual cost thereof
to the department. (5)

Certifications: no additional charge. (b) Fees shall be paid by check or money
order to "State Education Department."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
187.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
